title: Where you want to be.
text: It's definately where you want to be. Located next to Union Square and a block or two from some very expensive hotels. If you stay at the luxury ones on Nob Hill, you really have to take a cab or a stress test each time you come or go. Get a superior room, as the rooms are quite small. The place is well maintained and very clean, even if a little "thread bare." Great free continental breakfast and wine hour. The staff is very attentive and friendly- a real find!
